name: Southwestern Mini Turkey Meatballs
author: Dannon Oikos
summary: Bite-sized meatballs served with a spicy, creamy salsa dip. Makes enough for a party!
ingredients: 2 cups Dannon Oikos Plain Greek Nonfat Yogurt
1 cup prepared (jar) picante sauce or salsa, divided
1 teaspoon ground chipotle chili powder, divided
directions: In a bowl Mix together yogurt, salsa, cumin and chipotle chili powder
Set 1 1/2 cups aside in the refrigerator
In another bowl mix together turkey, crushed chips, egg, remaining seasoned yogurt, cilantro, corn, black beans
Using a small scoop spoon, make tablespoon sized balls, and place on a lightly greased shallow baking sheet and bake in a preheated 400 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until lightly browned
Serve meat balls on shredded lettuce with reserved sauce for dipping
